title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in a list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc'. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa', and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
